title: (x) The Fast And The Furious movie logo - Antique Olive Nord {Sebastian}
content:
Anyone know what the main typeface (the fast and the furious...) is?

[http://www.thefastandthefurious.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100830152221/http:/www.thefastandthefurious.com/ "http://www.thefastandthefurious.com/")

Cheers.
author: i0ta

comments.content:
Maybe [Antique Olive Nord italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100830152221/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/antique-olive/18-antique-olive-nord-italic-scal-97009/) by Marcel Olive?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100830152221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/antique.png)
Looks like it to me, cheers seb.

It's interesting that the URW version of that font did not have that Y. That was the one I looked at first, and I thought 'that's the wrong font', then I see that the other three foundries (Linotype, E+F and Scangraphic) all have the right Y style.

- Mike Yanega
